tool_description: Detect the language of your text fast! This API detects more than 160 languages and returns language code in ISO 639-1 format.
name: Fast Language Detection
title: Fast Language Detection

api_list.name: Detect
api_list.description: This endpoint takes your text in a JSON body and tries to detect the language of the text.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fast-language-detection.p.rapidapi.com/detect"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fast-language-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fast-language-detection.p.rapidapi.com/detect"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fast-language-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
